content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This module provides helpful new hire information.  Access is provided prior to your start date for your convenience, but review is voluntary, and all content will remain available after you begin your employment. \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"iframe\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"//videoportal.epam.com/video/iframe.html?video=lajxzgRB\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM not only relentlessly pursues the best solutions for our customers – we passionately act for good. Our employees are empowered to lead socially responsible education, environmental and community initiatives for the good of the world and everyone in it. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"As a company, we give back to the communities where we live and work and share our time, talent and knowledge to make a difference.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#9BC837\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM’s education programs and partnerships\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#9BC837\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" work to improve the knowledge of students across the world by using our expertise in technology. Our seamless and borderless approach has made positive changes within the IT sector.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We recognize the need to act with urgency to conserve and protect \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"our environment\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". We create innovative conservation solutions to offset our current footprint and plan for the future with agility, as we continue to strengthen our commitment to maintaining green practices throughout our business. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"As we work to move towards carbon neutrality, our careful planning represents an interconnected effort to lead our employees and our industry partners to a new standard of environmental responsibility.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":39695,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/3477f6b5-6715-4c94-9eb5-ef2c9b47fd7c/social2.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/3477f6b5-6715-4c94-9eb5-ef2c9b47fd7c/social2.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"social2.PNG\",\"name\":\"social2.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"3477f6b5-6715-4c94-9eb5-ef2c9b47fd7c\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":674,\"height\":382},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
